amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-395 to make changes to Title I Colorado Wilderness, and amounts to an approximate 60,000 acres of additional wilderness designations under Title I.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds four unique wilderness areas to the state of Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 189 (Roll no. 60).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. DeGette.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 189 (Roll no. 60).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
